content.question: int[] numbers = new int[5]; numbers[0] = 2; numbers[1] = numbers[0] + 1; numbers[numbers[0]] = numbers[1]; for (int x = 3; x < numbers.length; x++) { numbers[x] = numbers[x - 1] * 2; } Which of the following represents the contents of the array numbers after the code segment is executed?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
